alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Allamakee and western Crawford Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lansing, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lansing around 355 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Thompson Corner, Elon, Red Barn Campground, Churchtown, Village Creek, Dalby and Eldergrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
